markdownRemark.html:
hot inlet causes the operatino to be carried out on the object in addition to updating the inlet's corresponding internal values.

cold inlet update interal variables without producing output.

Note that the circle that appears around the inlet of an object when you hover about it with the mouse in edit mode is red for the hot inlets and blue for the cold inlets

author: Alessandro Cipriani
Maurizio Giri
